about_the_game:
Introducing Project Storm

The ultimate chase begins. In this solo/co-op action-adventure sim, you must conquer nature’s most dangerous and exhilarating displays,. Rise through the ranks to become a legendary stormchaser.

Project Storm offers an immersive and adrenaline-pumping journey like no other. Engage in heart-pounding adventures at the center of nature’s most thrilling spectacles. As a storm chaser, you’re not just playing a game—you’re diving into the thrilling unknown. You chase, you explore, you conquer.

In this multiplayer action/adventure-sim, you’ll experience a fresh take on storm chasing: rescuing stranded citizens, clearing blocked routes, or taking on the storm itself to weaken, redirect, or neutralize it. Spanning the adventure, simulation, and action genres, Project Storm promises to deliver new and exciting experiences. Traverse vast landscapes, from sprawling urban environments to dense forests and rugged mountains, all while navigating the ever-present danger of unpredictable weather patterns.

Survival hinges on smart strategies and effective teamwork. Join forces with other players, each bringing unique abilities to the table, and devise plans to tackle the various challenges that Mother Nature unleashes. At its core, Project Storm is set in a dynamic, reactive world where every decision counts, and every action shapes the outcome.

Welcome to Project Storm, where the ultimate chase isn’t just a game—it’s a life-changing adventure. Are you ready to chase the storm?

content_descriptors.notes:
Project Storm includes mild mature content that players should be aware of, such as:

Mild use of profanity and swearing
Insinuated consumption of alcohol and tobacco
The game also features the following interactive elements:

In-game purchases
Online interactions with other players
In-game chat functionality
Please note that while these elements are included to enhance player immersion and experience, they may not be suitable for all audiences. Players sensitive to mild language, references to alcohol or tobacco, or online interactions should exercise discretion when engaging with the game.

name: Project Storm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Project Storm: The ultimate storm-chasing action-adventure simulator. Brave nature's most dangerous forces in solo or co-op play as you rescue citizens, clear blocked routes, and face off against devastating storms. Work together or go alone, but every choice shapes your world.
